QuestData.Title: Control is King
QuestData.Description: Apexis technology is fascinating, isn't it? Machines powered by solar energy. Energy which itself has been imbued with magic!$B$BSimply brilliant!$B$BAh, but there's always a catch. And I think you may have found it.$B$BBring the interface device back to Veil Terokk, will you? I'll be along shortly with the Apexis cores.$B$BIf my theory is right, we may be able to turn the Adherents' own weapon against them!
QuestData.LogDescription: Bring the Apexis Interface to Darkscryer Raastok in Veil Terokk.
QuestData.RewardText: It will take some time, but this may be the key to our victory.
